amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funds for the Grain Inspection, Packers and Stockyards Administration Food Safety and Inspection Service by $5.5 million and decrease funds for the Farm Service Agency Salaries and Expenses by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds in the Grain Inspection, Packers and Stockyards Administration Food Safety and Inspection Service by $5.5 million and decrease funds in the Farm Service Agency Salaries and Expenses by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 272 (Roll no. 303).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 272 (Roll no. 303).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Grayson.
